EmailTemplate.name: Upcoming Salesforce Changes 26 B
EmailTemplate.subject: IMPORTANT PLEASE READ: New Feature Updates
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
This week's release contains changes to Opportunities and Campaign assignment logic
Commitment terms We've renamed the "Member Success" section on the Opportunity as "Sales Details" for improved clarity. This section contains a series of now required fields detailing inventory use case and projected move out details
Additionally, as an Opportunity may contain multiple reservables, you will now see a field labeled "Weighted Avg Commitment Term (in months)" which is the average of your Opportunityâ€™s commitments in months. Once an agreement is signed, commitment term and discount details are visible via related lists on the Opportunity
Reservable Hold Feature Select the "Reservable Hold" button on an Opportunity Then fill in the form and click Save. You will receive an email notification about your hold as well as updates at various benchmarks.
Additionally, a hold can be released by clicking the "Release Hold" button on the hold record The holds for an Opportunity are viewable via a related list
Billing Account Selector Update The Billing Account Selector page has been updated to include all Billing/Blank Accounts under an Organization in its results.
Campaign Assignment logic Lead/journey assignment can now be managed from campaigns To ensure that related journeys are routed correctly please ensure that the fields below are filled in when creating a Campaign
Additional Notes:
Lead Owner requires a user or Queue ID Email Address requires your building's email address City and State requires the same value on the building record
If you have any questions, please contact us at salesforcesupport@wework.com
Warmly,
Tykira
